past.desc:
Regional Business Imaging Solution Division: -
1. Global Account Management
- Acted as single point of contact in HK on behalf of Global Services Team
- Provided consultations on solution & IT infrastructure for multinational corporate accounts
- Prepared analyses for global customers to optimize business processes and cost-saving
- Developed project plans for implementation, transition and service level maintenance
- Aligned multiple external and internal parties for project implementaiton
- Coordinated enquiries and sales deals in 11 APAC countries

2. Product Marketing
- Formulated strategies for product development in HK, Taiwan and the Philippines
- Trainings, sales planning and marketing campaigns of Small Office Home Office (SOHO) products
- Achieved 10%+ sales growth in HK and No.1 market share in the Philippines in 2014
- Organized meetings with business partners and local sales channels to drive business opportunities
- Prepared sales analyses and market updates presenting to directors and management
